modalic.utils.serde module#

ProtoBuf serialization and deserialization.

modalic.utils.serde.bytes_to_ndarray(tensor: bytes, layer_shape: list[numpy.ndarray], dtype: str) → list[numpy.ndarray][source]#

Deserialize NumPy ndarray from u8 bytes.

modalic.utils.serde.chunk(iterable: Iterable[Any], chunksize: int) → zip[Any][source]#

helper chunking an iterable with fixed size.

modalic.utils.serde.dtype_to_struct(dtype: str) → str[source]#

Prepare dtype for conversion with struct.

modalic.utils.serde.get_shape(weights: list[numpy.ndarray]) → list[Any][source]#

Reads in the weights and returns its shape as a list object.

modalic.utils.serde.indexing(length: list[int]) → list[int][source]#

helper for preparing the indices at which array is splitted.

modalic.utils.serde.ndarray_to_bytes(ndarray: numpy.ndarray[Any, numpy.dtype[Any]], dtype: str) → list[int][source]#

Serialize NumPy ndarray to list of u8 bytes.

modalic.utils.serde.parameters_to_weights(parameters: protocol.Parameters, shapes: List[np.ndarray[int, np.dtype[Any]]]) → shared.Weights[source]#

Convert parameters object to NumPy weights.

modalic.utils.serde.weights_to_bytes(weights: list[numpy.ndarray], dtype: str) → bytes[source]#

Serialize NumPy ndarray to bytes.

modalic.utils.serde.weights_to_parameters(weights: shared.Weights, dtype: str, model_version: int) → protocol.Parameters[source]#

Convert NumPy weights to parameters object.
